mapper.select: SELECT t1.comment_id, t1.message, t1.uid, t1.uname, t1.icon, t1.product_id, t1.create_time, t1.comment_pid, t2.uid AS toUid, t2.uname AS toUname, t2.icon AS toIcon FROM product_comment t1 LEFT JOIN product_comment t2 ON t2.comment_id = t1.comment_pid WHERE t1.product_id = #{productId} AND t1.comment_pid != 0 AND t1.is_delete = 0 ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC
